org.jdrupes.httpcodec

Interface Codec

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Decoder<T,R>, Encoder<T>, ResponseDecoder<T,Q>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HttpCodec, HttpDecoder, HttpEncoder, HttpRequestDecoder, HttpRequestEncoder, HttpResponseDecoder, HttpResponseEncoder, WsDecoder, WsEncoder

    public interface Codec

    The base interface for all coders and decoders.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Codec.ProtocolSwitchResult
      Results that indicate a protocol switch must implement this interface.
      static class  Codec.Result
      The common properties of the result types returned by the various codecs.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ByteBuffer EMPTY_IN
      An empty input buffer that can be used for codec invocations when the (expected) body data is not yet available.

    • Field Detail

      • EMPTY_IN

        static final ByteBuffer EMPTY_IN

        An empty input buffer that can be used for codec invocations when the (expected) body data is not yet available.
